mapper.update: update `community` set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vote_size = #{voteSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answer_size = #{answerSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_size = #{readSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, asker_id = #{askerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, labels = #{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solve = #{solve,jdbcType=TINYINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select c.id as cid, c.title, c.vote_size as cvs, c.answer_size, c.read_size, c.content as cc, c.asker_id, c.create_time as cct, c.labels, c.solve, u.username, u.id, u.avatar, u.visitors from `user` u inner join `community` c on u.id = c.asker_id where c.id = #{id}
